desc: Run from Town to Efaunt's Tomb in under 2 minutes, with less than 132% move speed. No teleporting.
Run from Town to Efaunt's Tomb in under 2 minutes. No teleporting using the World Map.
Defeat 5 Giant Mobs of each type Bloque, Mamooth, Snowman, Penguin, & Thermister. Do it in that monster order.
Defeat 5 Giant Mobs of each type Bloque, Mamooth, Snowman, Penguin, Thermister. Do it in that monster order.
